TypeSignature.Value: .class nested protected auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewCell/DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject extends System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject

summary.span: Provides information about a to accessibility client applications.

span.span: Provides information about a to accessibility client applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows Form 包含可讓您的應用程式使用的協助工具用戶端應用程式的內建的協助工具支援。Windows Forms includes built-in accessibility support that allows your application to work with accessibility client applications. 協助工具用戶端應用程式的範例包括螢幕加大工具和檢閱者公用程式、 語音輸入公用程式、 螢幕小鍵盤、 其他輸入的裝置和鍵盤的增強功能的公用程式。Examples of accessibility client applications include screen enlarger and reviewer utilities, voice input utilities, on-screen keyboards, alternative input devices, and keyboard enhancement utilities. 類別繼承自類別，以提供資訊協助工具用戶端應用程式。The class inherits from the class to provide information about a to accessibility client applications. 表示視覺化的組件的每個類別— 這類， ，並— 也包含 繼承自的類別提供包含類別的相關資訊和執行動作，代表協助工具用戶端應用程式。Each class that represents a visual part of the —such as , , and —also contains a class that inherits from to provide information about the containing class and perform actions on behalf of accessibility client applications. 有執行個體時，您會想要提供其他資訊，例如名稱或描述控制項，協助工具用戶端應用程式。There are instances when you will want to provide additional information, such as the name or description of the control, to accessibility client applications. 有兩種方式可以提供這項額外資訊。There are two ways of providing this additional information. 若要提供現有控制項的有限的協助工具資訊，將控制項的和將協助工具用戶端應用程式報告的屬性值。To provide limited accessibility information for existing controls, set the control's and property values, which will be reported to accessibility client applications. > [!NOTE] > 您應該變更並中的屬性值只有少數的情況下，例如，如果您讓看起來像清單。You should change the and property values only in rare situations, such as if you make a look like a list. 有時候，您可能需要更多的協助工具資訊或不同的存取範圍的動作，以包含您的自訂或。Occasionally, you might require more accessibility information or different accessibility actions to be included with your custom or . 若要自訂 協助工具，您可以撰寫您自己的類別衍生自或是類別並覆寫方法。To customize accessibility, you can write your own class that derives from the or classes and override the method. 比方說，如果您要撰寫自訂的資料列標題儲存格實作唯一自訂動作的詳細資訊，例如您的資料格內特殊點擊測試，您應該建立繼承自的類別類別並覆寫方法。For example, if you are writing a custom row header cell that implements unique custom actions, such as special hit testing within your cell, you should create a class that inherits from the class and override the method. 公開其資料結構使用定義的資料值資料表階層架構。The exposes its data structure by using values to define the data table hierarchy. 如需有關如何公開資料表 Microsoft Active Accessibility 的詳細資訊，請參閱 「 公開資料的資料表透過 Microsoft Active Accessibility"位於 MSDN library， http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information on exposing data tables to Microsoft Active Accessibility, see "Exposing Data Tables through Microsoft Active Accessibility" in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果儲存格相關聯這是，這個方法不會執行任何動作。If the cell associated with this is a , this method does nothing. 否則為這個方法會選取儲存格，就目前的儲存格，和會採用下列動作之一：Otherwise, this method selects the cell, makes it the current cell, and takes one of the following actions: - 如果儲存格的屬性值是`true`，這個方法會傳回。If the cell's property value is `true`, this method returns. - 如果儲存格的屬性值是`null`，這表示儲存格無法裝載編輯控制項，則這個方法會傳回。If the cell's property value is `null`, meaning the cell cannot host an editing control, this method returns. - 如果儲存格目前進入或離開編輯模式 (例如，如果呼叫這個方法時，才或事件處理常式)，這個方法會傳回。If the cell is currently entering or leaving edit mode (for example, if this method is called in a or event handler), this method returns. - 如果儲存格目前處於編輯模式，這個方法會認可並結束編輯。If the cell is currently in edit mode, this method commits and ends the edit. - 如果儲存格不在編輯模式並屬性設定為，這個方法會傳回。If the cell is not in edit mode and the property is set to , this method returns. - 如果沒有任何上述動作會被使用，則這個方法會導致儲存格進入編輯模式。If none of the preceding actions is taken, this method causes the cell to enter edit mode.

summary.span: Gets the names of the owning cell's type and base type.

span.span: Gets the names of the owning cell's type and base type.

value.span: 主控儲存格之型別和基底型別名稱。

span.span: The names of the owning cell's type and base type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會傳回包含主控儲存格之型別名稱，例如後面的括號中，其基底型別名稱的字串"`DataGridViewTextBoxCell` (`DataGridViewCell`) 」。This property returns a string that includes the owning cell's type name followed by the name of its base type in parentheses, such as "`DataGridViewTextBoxCell` (`DataGridViewCell`)".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表描述這擁有時所傳回每個參數值的方法。The following table describes which owns the that is returned by the method for each parameter value. |參數值Parameter value|描述Description| |---------------------|-----------------| ||目前儲存格右邊。The to the right of the current cell. 傳回`null`如果目前的儲存格是在最右邊的資料行。 returns `null` if the current cell is in the right-most column.| ||目前儲存格的左邊。The to the left of the current cell. 如果目前的儲存格是在最左邊資料行，傳回資料列行首的可存取物件。 returns an accessible object for the row header if the current cell is in the left-most column.| ||擁有下一個較高的索引。The that has the next higher index. 傳回`null`如果目前的儲存格是在第一個資料行。 returns `null` if the current cell is in the first column.| ||擁有下一個較低的索引。The that has the next lower index. 傳回`null`目前儲存格是否在最後一個資料行。 returns `null` if the current cell is in the last column.| ||在相同的資料行及目前的儲存格上方的一個資料列。The in the same column and one row above the current cell. 傳回`null`如果目前的儲存格是在第一個資料列。 returns `null` if the current cell is in the first row.| ||在相同的資料行及目前的儲存格下方的一個資料列。The in the same column and one row below the current cell. 傳回`null`目前儲存格是否在最後一個資料列。 returns `null` if the current cell is in the last row.| |所有其他值All other values|`null`.`null`.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回值永遠會包含和值。The return value always includes the and values. 它也包含值，如果選取的相關聯的儲存格，則如果儲存格具有鍵盤焦點，則值和如果目前沒有顯示儲存格的值。It also includes the value if the associated cell is selected, the value if the cell has keyboard focus, and the value if the cell is not currently displayed.

summary.span: Gets or sets a string representing the formatted value of the owning cell.

span.span: Gets or sets a string representing the formatted value of the owning cell.
A representation of the cell value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含字串，表示儲存格的值屬性。The property contains a string that represents the value of the cell property. 如果已`null`，包含字串"(null)"。If is `null`, contains the string "(null)". 如果主控儲存格是標頭資料格、 是唯讀的或不屬於一個資料列，則設定這個屬性沒有任何作用。Setting this property has no effect if the owning cell is a header cell, is read-only, or does not belong to a row. 否則，請將這個屬性的設定：Otherwise, setting this property: - 結束目前正在進行任何編輯，並認可值。Ends any edit currently in progress and commits the value. - 使用儲存格並方法，以指定的值轉換成儲存格所表示的型別屬性。Uses the cell and methods to convert the specified value to the type indicated by the cell property. - 將儲存格的值設定為 已轉換的值。Sets the cell value to the converted value.
